Description.Name: MG Tracer Ammo
Description.Details: Tracer ammunition are slug-firing rounds to aid in the targeting of rapid-firing weapons. Inserted at regular intervals with regular rounds, a small amount of pyrotechnical chemical at the base of the tracer produces a bright light as it moves through the air. The glowing effect shows the path of the weapon's shots so that the firer may easily adjust their aim for maximum effect. Additionally, the tracer chemicals temporarily mark the target so that other units can hit them more easily. Has 100 shots.
